description:
simple script to kill, deploy and re-start your node application (call 'npm start'). For a more \
 complex use, check 'node-deploy' hook. You must define 3 variables : 'node-restart-deploy-path', \
 'node-restart-pid-file' and 'node-restart-log-file'. Deploy path must be the full deploy path for \
 your project, ie : /opt/project-name (will be remove on every restart)
